rules.description: Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Change enter to control if pressed with other keys
alt+' instead alt+e to add special characters (á, é, í, ó, ú)
[option+shift] Change tab to option+shift if pressed with other keys
[option+shift] Change  to option+shift if pressed with other keys
